page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = INET::SSLSocket::CreateCertificateRequest( CertificateFile as C, PrivateKeyFile as C, PrivateKeyPassword as C [, CountryCode as C [, State as C [, Locality as C [, Organization as C [, OrganizationalUnit as C [, CommonName as C ]]]]]] )

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: CertificateFile
argument.description: The path and name of the SSL Server Certificate file.

argument.name: PrivateKeyFile
argument.description: The path and name of the private key file.

argument.name: PrivateKeyPassword
argument.description: The password for the private key file.

page.description: The INET::SSLSocket::CreateCertificateRequest() method creates a request for a certificate.
